original_title: The People's Joe: A True Story
overview: From the producers of 365 Days: Year In Happy Valley and The Joe We Know comes The People’s Joe: A True Story.  This is the story of Joe Paterno told by those who knew him well and those who knew him only by name, or “JoePa.”  It is the people’s story.
tagline: From the producers of 365 Days: Year In Happy Valley and The Joe We Know comes The People’s Joe: A True Story.  This is the story of Joe Paterno told by those who knew him well and those who knew him only by name, or “JoePa.”  It is the people’s story.
title: The People's Joe: A True Story
